thread.title: Ground News - Local Joe offers sense of community one cup at a time
thread.title_full: Ground News - Local Joe offers sense of community one cup at a time

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Local Joe offers sense of community one cup at a time
text:
Summary by Ground News Charles Asselbye, also known as Local Joe, has been in the coffee business for 30 years. He says his secret to success is a sense of community. The second Local Joe is in Kapolei, steps away from a train station and UH West Oahu campus. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
KHON2 Center High Factuality Media Conglomerate: Nexstar Media Group Local Joe offers sense of community one cup at a time HONOLULU (KHON2) — A business that we featured five years ago has a new location but carries over the same experience as the original shop. For Charles Asselbye, also known as Local Joe, making a cup of coffee is so much more than making a cup of coffee–for him, it all begins with the beans […]
